Package Collecto

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Collecto.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientController
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a basic controller which can prompt the user for regular input, a port or an IP address. It is used by the Server class to initialize the server, and has a subclass ClientController.
    See Also:
    Server, ClientController

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.Scanner scanner  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Controller()
      Constructs a Controller and initiates a new scanner for user input.

      Prompts user for a port until it verifies validness of this port.
      java.lang.String promptUser()
      Returns line input by the user containing no leading and trailing spaces.

        public java.lang.String promptUser​(java.lang.String message)
        Prints provided message and then returns line input by the user after the message containing no leading and trailing spaces.
        Parameters:
        message - message to output before prompting the user
        Returns:
        input line
        Ensures:
        line contains no leading and trailing spaces

      • promptAddress

        public java.net.InetAddress promptAddress()
        Prompts user for an host address until it verifies validness of this address. Then returns this address.
        Returns:
        InetAddress to use in Sockets
        Ensures:
        host address is valid InetAddress

      • promptPort

        public java.lang.Integer promptPort()
        Prompts user for a port until it verifies validness of this port. Then returns this port.
        Returns:
        port
        Ensures:
        port is valid positive integer
